data.title: Corel Pinnacle Studio 20 Ultimate specifications
data.meta_description: Corel Pinnacle Studio 20 Ultimate specifications, prices, product images and videos.
data.text:
Below you will find the product specifications and the manual specifications of the Corel Pinnacle Studio 20 Ultimate.

Corel Pinnacle Studio 20 Ultimate is a comprehensive photo and video editing software that offers a range of features suitable for both professional and amateur users. With an intuitive user interface and customizable workspace, users can create and edit high-quality videos and images with ease. The software comes with a range of tools such as animated titles, 3D editing, and multi-camera editing, which allows for creative flexibility in video production. Pinnacle Studio 20 Ultimate supports 4K Ultra HD video rendering, enabling users to create videos with stunning clarity and detail. It also includes performance-enhancing features such as optimization for Intel 6th generation processor systems and new Split Screen video templates, providing users with even more creative possibilities. The software boasts over 2000 effects, transitions, and templates, making it a versatile option for various forms of media. Audio editing features include the ability to remove background noise and normalize audio levels. Corel Pinnacle Studio 20 Ultimate also provides users with the ability to share creations on various platforms such as YouTube, Vimeo, and Facebook. It also supports burning DVDs and Blu-ray discs. Overall, Corel Pinnacle Studio 20 Ultimate is a reliable and comprehensive photo and video editing software for all skill levels. Its range of features and customization options make it a versatile choice for various types of media production.
